1: 'gyur ba <mistake>med//nyams</mistake> pa'i nyams pa nyid kyang <mistake>med//nub</mistake> pa de yi nub pa <mistake>med//'char</mistake> ba yi ni 'char <mistake>ba</mistake> <mistake>med//rabtu</mistake> gsal ba'i rab <mistake>gal</mistake> <mistake>med// bkab</mistake> pa'i bkab pa yang med <mistake>do //skye</mistake> ba'i skye bar
2: 'gyur <mistake>nyid</mistake> <mistake>med//'chi</mistake> ba'i 'chi ba yang med <mistake>do//grol</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> <mistake>'grol</mistake> bar 'gyur ba <mistake>'ang</mistake> <mistake>med//mi</mistake> gnas pa yi <mistake>mignas</mistake> <mistake>med//dngos</mistake> po med pa'i dngos med <mistake>med //dngos</mistake> <mistake>po'i</mistake> dngos po nyid kyang <mistake>med//'gyur</mistake> <mistake>bpa</mistake>
3: 'gyur bar <mistake>'gyu</mistake> <mistake>laba</mistake> <mistake>lang</mistake> <mistake>med//mi</mistake> 'gyur ba'i <mistake>yad</mistake> mi 'gyur <mistake>med// radg</mistake> bzhin med pa'i chos rnams <mistake>kyi//skye</mistake> 'jig <mistake>skyu</mistake> ma de bzhin <mistake>no// 'byung</mistake> rnams 'jigs par 'gyur min <mistake>te//rang</mistake> bzhin nyid kyis <mistake>skyem</mistake>
4: <mistake>'gyur//sna</mistake> tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin <mistake>med// dngos</mistake> po dngos med mtshan nyid <mistake>gcig/ /rang</mistake> gi shes rab la <mistake>'khyad</mistake> <mistake>sems// rdo</mistake> rje nor <mistake>bu'i</mistake> <mistake>padmar</mistake> <mistake>son// der</mistake> son zla ba g.yo ba <mistake>dang //mi</mistake> g.yo ba dang mi 'gyur <mistake>bsbgos</mistake>
5: lus <mistake>dag</mistake> sems kyi rtsa rnams <mistake>su//sku</mistake> gsung thugs rnams bsgom pa ste // rdo rje gsum rnams legs bsdus <mistake>pa//ye</mistake> shes dung can mar bsgom <mistake>pa'o //shes</mistake> rab chags pas zhu ba yi // thig <mistake>lernim</mistake>
6: pas mgo <mistake>bo</mistake> <mistake>las//rdogs</mistake> pa'i gnas su zhugs rnams <mistake>kyang//'ching</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> dam pa'i don gyis <mistake>so//ji</mistake> ltar zla shar rim pa <mistake>yis//n'a</mistake> rnams kyis ni rdzogs par <mistake>'gyur //grib</mistake> ma nyams pa <mistake>rdogs</mistake> pa <mistake>ste//zla</mistake>
7: ba chad dang <mistake>rdzog</mistake> pa <mistake>min// de</mistake> bzhin ye shes shar rim <mistake>pas//sa</mistake> rnams kyis ni rdzogs par <mistake>'gyur//nyon</mistake> mongs la sogs nyams pa <mistake>rdzogs//ye</mistake> shes chad dang rdzogs pa min // ji ltar ri bong mtshan
8: mas <mistake>dbus//rdzogs</mistake> par ri bong can mi <mistake>gnas// de</mistake> bzhin 'gyur med bde bar <mistake>sems//'khor</mistake> ba'i bag chags mtshan ma <mistake>yis//skyed</mistake> dang rab tu nyams pa'i <mistake>phyogs//dkar</mistake> po nag por rab tu
